subject: reg:enabling assertion in Junit
msgSnippet: Hi , How are assertions enabled in Junit? To enable assertions in Jdk1.4,we use -ea flag . While using Junit which implicitly uses assertions, how are
messageBody:
Hi ,

How are assertions enabled in Junit?
To enable assertions in Jdk1.4,we use -ea flag .
While using Junit which implicitly uses assertions, how are assertions implicitly enabled ?
Thanks in advance for your replies.



Thanks and Regards
Naveen.N
